item.title: Editor config is still hard
item.description: Today I learned that configuring your code editor to lint and format code in a predictable way is still hard. I use two editors frequently - Sublime Text and VS Code. Both are great. Both have plugins and their own settings. Today I was trying to update my environment for a Vue project in VS Code. I wanted the .vue files to be linted with ESLint, and for Prettier to handle the formatting.
